overview: On November 3, 1996, «the richest man in Ukraine»,  Yevhen Shcherban, was killed in Donetsk. At the time of the murder, his fortune was estimated at about $ 500 million. Scherban's companies were engaged in the production and sale of metal, gas, oil products, construction and financial transactions. The elder son of the murdered businessman Yevhen Shcherban Jr. has been conducting his own investigation since 2013 and is trying to find out where his father's inheritance has disappeared.
title: The Heir. An Investigation Film
